name: sprint-taskgen
description: Generate milestone-prefixed sub-tasks for every story in a Jira sprint
author: data-engineering-team

plugins.name: atlassian
plugins.description: Atlassian plugin (atlassian@claude-plugins-official) — must be connected to Resonate Jira and Confluence

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack plugin — must be connected to Resonate Slack workspace
plugins.installHint: Connect Slack via Claude Code settings

plugins.name: aws-ccapi
plugins.description: AWS Cloud Control API MCP server — for investigating AWS resources referenced in stories
plugins.installHint: Configure aws-ccapi MCP server with valid AWS credentials

permissions: Write access to the target Jira project (create sub-tasks)
Read access to sprint boards, stories, and Confluence spaces
Read access to Slack channels for searching discussions
Read access to GitHub repos via gh CLI (must be authenticated)
Read access to AWS resources (for infrastructure context)
